Generation IX.Scarlet: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.
Generation IX.Violet: Its well-developed jaw and fangs are strong enough to crunch through boulders, and its thick fat makes for an excellent defense.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Four West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Four West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
